merata muhudu thiraya aakramanaya kirima nisa athadanguwata pathwu indiya dhiwarayan 77 deneku ada nidahas kerenawa.ee sandaha awashya nithimaya niyoga me wana witath nikuuth kara athi athara nidahas kirime kriyawaliya dina dekakadi sampurna kerenu athi.meyin dhiwarayin 49 deneku uurkawanthure, mannarama saha puththalam adhikarana magin nidahas karanu labuwa.ithiri dhiwarayan nidahas kirime niyoga ada dinaye adhikarana magin labadenu athayi apekshithayi.dhiwarayan nidahas kara ganima sandaha indiya rajaya rajya thanthrika mattamin madihath wu bawayi erata madhya prakasha kale.
